# init(requestConfiguration:delegate:)

**Initializer**

Returns an initialized add payment view controller object, using the provided configuration and delegate.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init?(requestConfiguration configuration: PKAddPaymentPassRequestConfiguration, delegate: (any PKAddPaymentPassViewControllerDelegate)?)
```

## Parameters

- **configuration**: A configuration object that defines the view controller’s appearance.
- **delegate**: The add payment view controller’s delegate.

## Return Value

A newly initialized add payment view controller.

## Discussion

Adding payment passes requires a special entitlement issued by Apple. If your app does not include this entitlement, this method returns `nil`. For more information on requesting this entitlement, see the Card Issuers section on [https://developer.apple.com/apple-pay/].

## Creating an add-payment-pass view controller

- **PKAddPaymentPassRequestConfiguration**: Contains the configuration data for a view controller that lets the user add a payment pass.
